main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in the San Antonio, Texas area on various dates in May 1952. The sightings described bright, disc-shaped objects displaying erratic and unusual maneuvers in the sky. The observations lasted several minutes and were documented by military personnel and civilians.
interesting points: The sightings described the objects as intensely bright, disc-shaped, and sometimes appearing as thin stratus layers of clouds before transforming into disc shapes.
The objects were observed to exhibit erratic movement, frequently coming to sudden halts and oscillating before ascending out of sight.
One report suggested that the observed object could possibly be a balloon or an aircraft, highlighting the uncertainty and mystery surrounding the sightings.
Pilot with 3,100 hours of flying time reported a small, intensely bright, thin object traveling at a high rate of speed, estimated to be greater than 600 mph.
Weather conditions during the sightings included high thin scattered cirrus clouds, good visibility, and various surface wind speeds.
sighted object: bright, disc-shaped objects with erratic movement
